reviewText: In this DVD, a former LDS member, Mr Deker, shares with us his experience in the LDS cult. He also presents an animated part which shows basic Mormon theology, a theology that Mormons try to hide or water-down when presenting their "gospel" to potential converts.While, of course,  Mr Deker's opinions and experiences  in the cult are surely personal, the animated segment  is  objective and in line with LDS literature and "inspired" works.The cartoon, brief and concise,  perfectly depicts the many differences between the Mormon "god" and the real God of the BibleAll the literature that Mr. Deker presents is  correct and nothing was taken out of  context.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This film does a good job of exposing Mormonism as the cult that it is.  It is like a cake the looks good and is decorated nicely, but when you see what is inside, you wouldn't want to eat it.
summary: Old DVD - But Info Still Good
